meanings.definition: A food containing health-giving additives and having medicinal benefit.
meanings.sent1: Many people believe that nutraceuticals can improve overall health.
meanings.sent2: My doctor recommended incorporating nutraceuticals into my diet for better nutrition.
meanings.sent3: The nutraceuticals in the smoothie gave it a magical touch.
meanings.sent4: Her daily dose of nutraceuticals was like a secret weapon against illness.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of the nutraceuticals made them look like candy.

meanings.definition: A product derived from food sources with extra health benefits in addition to the basic nutritional value found in foods.
meanings.sent1: The market offers a variety of nutraceuticals for different health needs.
meanings.sent2: Nutraceuticals are becoming increasingly popular for their added health advantages.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the nutraceuticals turned her into a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The benefits of nutraceuticals were like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The nutraceuticals provided a boost of energy that was truly remarkable.
